name: 001 Apple Pie Chiaseed Pudding

ingredients.name: Almond or Oat Milk (any is fine)

instructions: Mix (stir) maple syrup, milk, apple sauce, chia seeds, and 1/4 tsp cinnamon together in a mason jar (place ingredients in that order).
Peal and slice apple into edible chunks.
Just before serving, cook apple chunks, 1 tbsp maple syrup, 1 tsp cinnamon in a saucepan lined with the coconut oil.
Place toppings on top with a pinch of cinnamon.
notes: Apple suggestions: Kanzi (EU), Envy (NZ), Pink Lady (WA), Bravo (WA), Cosmic Crisp (US) - in that order.
